name: Grafana Cloud
description: Search dashboards, query Prometheus and Loki datasources, manage alerts, investigate incidents, and use Grafana Cloud features like Sift, OnCall, and Incidents.

inputs.label: Grafana Cloud URL
inputs.description: URL of your Grafana Cloud instance (e.g., https://myinstance.grafana.net).

inputs.label: Grafana Service Account Token
inputs.description: Service account token from your Grafana Cloud instance. Create one with the Editor role for full access.

obtain.instructions:
1. Log in to your Grafana Cloud instance
2. Navigate to Administration > Service accounts
3. Click 'Add service account'
4. Assign the 'Editor' role
5. Click 'Add service account token'
6. Copy the generated token (starts with glsa_)

inputs.label: Grafana Organization ID
inputs.description: Organization ID for multi-org Grafana Cloud setups. Leave empty for single-org instances.

auth.instructions: Create a service account token in your Grafana Cloud instance under Administration > Service accounts
